userStories.title: Project Setup and Configuration
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to set up the Astro.js project with React, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui so that I have a solid foundation for building the application.
acceptanceCriteria: Astro.js project is initialized with latest version
React integration is added and configured
Tailwind CSS is installed and configured with custom theme
shadcn/ui is initialized with required components (button, card, input, select, calendar, popover, dialog, checkbox, badge, separator)
Project structure follows the defined architecture
TypeScript is configured with proper types
Dependencies installed: react-hook-form, zod, @hookform/resolvers, lucide-react, date-fns

userStories.title: Design System and Theme Implementation
userStories.description: As a designer, I want the application to follow a consistent design system so that the UI is cohesive and professional.
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette is implemented in global.css with CSS variables
Typography uses Inter or system fonts
All shadcn/ui components use the custom theme
Dark and light variants are properly defined

userStories.title: Layout Component
userStories.description: As a user, I want a consistent page layout so that navigation and branding are uniform across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: Proper HTML document structure with head and body
Meta tags are included for SEO
Slot for page content is implemented

userStories.title: Header Navigation
userStories.description: As a user, I want a header with navigation links so that I can easily access different sections of the website.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links: Fleet, Special Offers, Offices, Customer Support, Login
Manage booking button is prominently displayed as primary action
Header is responsive with hamburger menu on mobile
Navigation links are accessible with keyboard
Header is rendered as static HTML (no client directive)

userStories.title: Language Selector Modal
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select my preferred language so that I can view the website in my native language.
acceptanceCriteria: Language selector opens a modal dialog
Four language options: Hrvatski, English, French, Deutsche
Each language displays with its flag
Selected language is stored in localStorage
Uses client:load directive for immediate interactivity

userStories.title: Floating Notification Bar
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see important notifications that I can dismiss so that I stay informed without being annoyed.
acceptanceCriteria: Notification bar displays at top of page
Shows message: 'Hey, this is floating notification! You can turn it on and off.'
Close/dismiss button is visible and functional
Notification is accessible with proper ARIA labels

userStories.title: Hero Section
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see an attractive hero section so that I understand what the company offers.
acceptanceCriteria: Heading displays: 'Your No1 rent a car in Croatia title'
Heading is large, white, and centered
Booking form card is overlaid on the hero
Section is responsive on all screen sizes

userStories.title: Booking Form - Location Selection
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select pick-up and drop-off locations so that I can specify where I need the car.
acceptanceCriteria: When checkbox is unchecked, drop-off uses same location as pick-up
Form validates that location is selected

userStories.title: Booking Form - Date and Time Selection
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select pick-up and return dates and times so that I can specify my rental period.
acceptanceCriteria: Pick-up date picker using calendar component
Return date picker using calendar component
Cannot select return date before pick-up date
Date format is localized based on language

userStories.title: Booking Form - Submission and Validation
userStories.description: As a user, I want to submit my booking search with validation so that I can find available cars.
acceptanceCriteria: Show button (primary CTA) submits the form
Clear error messages displayed in selected language
All required fields must be filled
Form uses React Hook Form for state management
Uses client:load directive for immediate hydration

userStories.title: Feature Cards Section
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the key features of the service so that I understand the benefits.
acceptanceCriteria: Three feature cards displayed in a row
Card 1: 'A wide range of vehicles' with description and 'Vehicle fleet' link
Card 2: 'Additional services' with description and 'More informations' link
Card 3: 'Branches in 6 airports' listing cities and 'All offices' link
Each card has an icon/image placeholder
Rendered as static HTML (no client directive)

userStories.title: Special Offers Section
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see special offers so that I can find discounts and deals.
acceptanceCriteria: Each card shows image of happy travelers
Uses client:visible directive for lazy hydration

userStories.title: Image Carousel Component
userStories.description: As a user, I want to navigate through multiple offers in a carousel so that I can see all available deals.

userStories.title: Rental Stations Map Section
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see rental station locations on a map so that I can find nearby offices.
acceptanceCriteria: Interactive map of Croatia showing locations
City name pills: Split, Zadar, Rijeka, Zagreb, Dubrovnik, Pula
Clicking city highlights location on map
Uses client:visible directive for lazy hydration

userStories.title: Why Rent Section
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see the benefits of renting with LastMinute so that I feel confident in my choice.
acceptanceCriteria: Section heading: 'Why rent with Last Minute?'
Two columns of benefits with checkmark icons
Responsive layout on all screen sizes
Rendered as static HTML (no client directive)

userStories.title: Footer Component
userStories.description: As a user, I want a footer with company information and links so that I can find additional resources.

userStories.title: Internationalization Setup
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to implement i18n support so that the website can display content in multiple languages.
acceptanceCriteria: Translation files created for Croatian, English, French, German

userStories.title: Fleet Page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to browse the vehicle fleet so that I can see available car options.
acceptanceCriteria: Vehicle cards with images and details

userStories.title: Special Offers Page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view all special offers so that I can find the best deals.

userStories.title: Offices Page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to view all office locations so that I can find the nearest rental station.
acceptanceCriteria: Address and contact information for each

userStories.title: Customer Support Page
userStories.description: As a user, I want to access customer support information so that I can get help when needed.

userStories.title: Responsive Design Implementation
userStories.description: As a user, I want the website to work well on all devices so that I can use it on mobile, tablet, or desktop.
acceptanceCriteria: Booking form fields stack vertically on mobile
Feature cards single column on mobile
No horizontal scrolling on any screen size

userStories.title: Accessibility Implementation
userStories.description: As a user with disabilities, I want the website to be accessible so that I can use it effectively.
acceptanceCriteria: ARIA labels on all interactive elements
Proper heading hierarchy (h1, h2, h3, etc.)

userStories.title: SEO Implementation
userStories.description: As a marketer, I want the website to be SEO optimized so that it ranks well in search engines.
acceptanceCriteria: Meta tags on each page (title, description)
Open Graph tags for social sharing
Structured data (Schema.org) for rental car business

userStories.title: Performance Optimization
userStories.description: As a user, I want the website to load quickly so that I have a good experience.
acceptanceCriteria: Images optimized using Astro's image optimization
Images below fold are lazy loaded
React used only for interactive components

userStories.title: API Integration Preparation
userStories.description: As a developer, I want API utility functions prepared so that backend integration is straightforward.
acceptanceCriteria: Ready for Symfony/API Platform backend connection

userStories.title: TypeScript Types Definition
userStories.description: As a developer, I want TypeScript types defined so that the codebase is type-safe.
acceptanceCriteria: Types exported from /src/lib/utils.ts or dedicated types file
